net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.dialogs

Class VocableTrainer2OptionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.dialogs.VocableTrainerInfoDialog
                • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.dialogs.VocableTrainer2OptionDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class VocableTrainer2OptionDialog
extends VocableTrainerInfoDialog
    A dialog with two options that can be used to get a binary decision (Yes/No, Accept/Decline, etc.) from the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
